select
from T_BFS_DICT_TYPE where 1=1
and DICT_TYPE_ID = #{dictTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND DICT_TYPE_NM like ('%' || #{dictTypeNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%')
order by CREATE_TMS desc

from T_BFS_DICT_TYPE where 1=1
and DICT_TYPE_ID = #{dictTypeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND DICT_TYPE_NM like ('%' || #{dictTypeNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%')
limit #{head.pgsn}, #{head.pgrw} order by CREATE_TMS desc
